items.content_html: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: uvarov-frontend/vanilla-calendar-pro: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.

items.content_html: [IN-PROGRESS] nestjs-rivulex is a NestJS transport layer and wrapper for Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It ensures reliable, at-least-once message delivery within NestJS applications.
items.title: raw-leak/nestjs-rivulex: [IN-PROGRESS] nestjs-rivulex is a NestJS transport layer and wrapper for Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It ensures reliable, at-least-once message delivery within NestJS applications.

items.content_html: [IN-PROGRESS] Rivulex is a lightweight, efficient message broker library written in pure JavaScript. It ensures at-least-once delivery guarantees over Redis Streams.
items.title: raw-leak/rivulex: [IN-PROGRESS] Rivulex is a lightweight, efficient message broker library written in pure JavaScript. It ensures at-least-once delivery guarantees over Redis Streams.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
